message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk to start.  Let's see what you think!

Alice, your starting offer was quite cheeky!  Inflation is eating away at your potential gains far quicker than mine. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you $350,000.  Let's close this deal and call it a day.
Okay, Bob, I see you're playing hardball. Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take $450,000, and you can have the rest.  We both get a decent amount, and we can move on with our lives.
